CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Wishlist stage positioned above or below the Add to Cart stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Wishlist stage is positioned {above} the Add to Cart stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Visit Product Page?
VE.A: The value of stage Visit Product Page is {14429}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {3265}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {2330}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Visit Product Page, with a value of {14429}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Purchase, with a value of {2084}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {3266} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist?
SC.A: Decreased by {5582} Users from stage Visit Product Page to stage Add to Wishlist.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout?
SC.A: Decreased by {2316} Users from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 7214? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Visit Product Page} stage has {14429}, the {Add to Wishlist} stage has {8847}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2207? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2797 and 7214? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Cart} stage has {5581}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {3265}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Visit Product Page} and {Add to Wishlist} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
